text: Te, kotoryye zhivut v svoikh domakh, prinyavshi veru prezhde drugikh, lyubyat pereselivshikhsya k nim: v serdtsakh svoikh oni ne nakhodyat zhelaniya poluchit' to, chto etim dayetsya, i dayut im predpochteniye nad soboyu, khotya i nakhodyatsya v nishchete: a kotoryye osteregut sebya ot lyubostyazhaniya, te budut blazhenny
